name: pronouncedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very noticeable or certain: Research has suggested that male and female bosses have pronouncedly different managerial styles. "Are you here for the fashion show?" asked the doorman, emphasizing the word "you" very pronouncedly.
More examplesFewer examplesTwo of the eight sculptures are narrow and tall, one of them pronouncedly so.Her clothes are pronouncedly English and extremely wearable, without ever being tediously sensible. As the band starts to become more lively, their dancing becomes pronouncedly more energetic.
